DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to assess whether transurethral enucleation of prostate gives better or equivalent outcomes compared to the gold standard of transurethral resection of the prostate
DOC.brief_title: To Compare Outcomes After Transurethral Enucleation of Prostate Versus Transurethral Resection of Prostate
DOC.criteria: All who underwent TURP or TUERP Those with prostate cancer, neurogenic bladder, previous urethral or prostate surgery
